Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HSV-1 H glycoprotein (gH))
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18572274]Herpes simplex virus type 1(HSV-1):inhibition of viral-entry in Vero cells(60% inhibition at 250μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.18572274]No cytotoxicity against Vero cells up to 500 μM.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits virus entry and thus protects cells from infection.

Literature.Title: Peptides containing membrane-interacting motifs inhibit herpes simplex virus type 1 infectivity.
Literature.Author: Galdiero S, Falanga A, Vitiello M, D'Isanto M, Cantisani M, Kampanaraki A, Benedetti E, Browne H, Galdiero M.
